info.title: Bitcoin - Blockchain Indexer API
info.description:
This API provides core indexer endpoints with support for Bitcoin metaprotocols by delivering real-time, rollback-protected access to Bitcoin's UTXO data, enabling developers to build responsive and reliable blockchain applications without managing complex infrastructure.

#### Key Features:
- **Real-Time Data with Rollback Protection:** Ensures data accuracy by handling chain reorganizations gracefully, providing live data without sacrificing integrity.
- **Comprehensive UTXO Indexing:** Specialized pipelines extract, match, and process on-chain information, including handling rollbacks, to provide accurate and up-to-date data.

#### Key Benefits for Developers:
By abstracting the complexities of blockchain data retrieval and processing, Maestro's Bitcoin Indexer API empowers developers to focus on building innovative applications with confidence in fast and reliable access to historical chain data.

get.description: Returns all transactions for a given address or script pubkey, allowing insight into when the balance increased, decreased, or remained the same. This endpoint supports customization to narrow results by time, transaction type, or ordering, enabling tailored historical views.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Bitcoin address or hex encoded script pubkey

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order in which the results are sorted. Supported values: asc, desc

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Return only transactions included on or after a specific height

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Return only transactions included on or before a specific height

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

parameters.name: activity_kind
parameters.description: Only return transactions of a specific activity kind. Supported values: "increase" for transactions where satoshi balance increases, "decrease" for decrease, and "self_transfer" for transactions where satoshi balance remained the same.

parameters.name: exclude_self_transfers
parameters.description: Do not return self-transfer transactions - transactions in which satoshi balance did not increase or decrease.

get.description: Returns the total balance in satoshis held at the specified address or script pubkey by summing all unspent outputs (UTXOs). This is a direct snapshot of the address's spendable funds and does not include mempool transactions.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Bitcoin address or hex encoded script pubkey

get.description: Returns the historical satoshi balances, itemized by block and including USD price.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Bitcoin address or hex encoded script pubkey

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order in which the results are sorted. Supported values: asc, desc

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Return only blocks included on or after a specific height or timestamps. If this parameter is not provided, the starting point will be the first block where the address has seen its balance increase or decrease.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Return only blocks included on or before a specific height or timestamp

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

parameters.name: height_params
parameters.description: Whether the from and to integer query params should be read as timestamps or as block heights. True (the default) means from and to params should be read as block heights.

get.description: Returns a collection of BRC20 tokens associated with the address, showing both the total and available (transferable) balances. This is essential for building BRC20 token wallets and dashboards.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Bitcoin address or hex encoded script pubkey

get.description: Returns all unspent BRC20 transfer inscriptions residing at the address. This endpoint is critical for applications facilitating token transfers, as it identifies transfer-eligible inscriptions.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Bitcoin address or hex encoded script pubkey

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: BRC20 ticker string

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order in which the results are sorted

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

get.description: Retrieves all inscriptions currently controlled by a specific address. Useful for wallet UIs and inscription portfolio views.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Bitcoin address or hex encoded script pubkey

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

get.description: Returns all inscription-related transactions involving a specific address. Can be filtered by activity type (send, receive, self-transfer), narrowed to a specific inscription, and sorted chronologically. Useful for building dashboards, tracking user behavior, or filtering unwanted spam activity.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Bitcoin address or hex encoded script pubkey

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order in which the results are sorted. Supported values: asc, desc

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Return only transactions created on or after a specific height

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Return only transactions created on or before a specific height

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

parameters.name: inscription_id
parameters.description: Return only transactions containing a specific inscription, specified by an inscription ID. In presence of activity_kind, it relates to this specific inscription. In presence of exclude_self_transfers, it is this specific inscription that should be sent or received but not self-transferred.

parameters.name: activity_kind
parameters.description: Filter txs by presence of specific activity kind. Supported values: send, receive, self_transfer. In presence of inscription filter, the activity kind relates to that specific inscription. In presence of exclude_self_transfers, this activity kind cannot be self_transfer.

parameters.name: exclude_self_transfers
parameters.description: Exclude txs only containing inscriptions self-transfers. In presence of activity_kind, it cannot be self_transfer. In presence of inscription filter, that specific inscription should be sent or received, not self-transferred.

get.description: Provides a list of all Rune assets held by the specified address. It returns both total and available balances, allowing for token inventory management and portfolio tracking.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Bitcoin address or hex encoded script pubkey

get.description: Return all transactions where the specified address has rune activity, with the option to filter by a specific rune kind.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Bitcoin address or hex encoded script pubkey

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order in which the results are sorted. Supported values: asc, desc

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Return only transactions created on or after a specific height

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Return only transactions created on or before a specific height

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

parameters.name: rune
parameters.description: Return only transactions containing a specific rune, specified either by the rune ID (etching block number and transaction index) or name (spaced or un-spaced). In presence of activity_kind, it relates to this specific rune. In presence of exclude_self_transfers, it is this specific rune that the queried address should see increase or decrease in balance in the tx, not just being self-transferred.

parameters.name: activity_kind
parameters.description: Filter txs by presence specific activity kind. Supported values: increased, decreased, self_transfer. In presence of rune filter, the activity kind relates to that specific rune. In presence of exclude_self_transfers, this activity kind cannot be self_transfer.

parameters.name: exclude_self_transfers
parameters.description: Exclude txs only containing runes self-transfers. In presence of activity_kind, it cannot be self_transfer. In presence of rune filter, that specific rune should be sent or received, not self-transferred.

get.description: Lists all UTXOs at the address or script pubkey that contains Rune tokens, with optional refinement based on Rune type or metadata. Helpful for spend analysis or wallet state audits.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Bitcoin address or hex encoded script pubkey

parameters.name: rune
parameters.description: Return only UTxOs containing a specific Rune, specified either by the Rune ID (etching block number and transaction index) or name (spaced or un-spaced)

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: The property by which response items should be sorted. Supported values: height (height of block which produced the UTxO - default), amount (amount of runes in UTxO)

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order in which the results are sorted. Supported values: asc, desc

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Return only UTxOs created on or after a specific height

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Return only UTxOs created on or before a specific height

get.summary: (deprecated) Rune UTxOs by Address and Rune
get.description: Return all UTxOs controlled by the specified address or script pubkey which contain runes, with the option to filter by a specific rune kind.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Bitcoin address or hex encoded script pubkey

parameters.name: rune
parameters.description: Rune, specified either by the Rune ID (etching block number and transaction index) or name (spaced or un-spaced)

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order in which the results are sorted (by height at which UTxO was produced)

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Return only UTxOs created on or after a specific height

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Return only UTxOs created on or before a specific height

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

get.description: Returns all current statistics of the address: total txs the address was involved in, total unspent outputs controlled by the address, current satoshi, control of any runes and inscription balance.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Bitcoin address or hex encoded script pubkey

get.description: List of all transactions which consumed or produced a UTxO controlled by the specified address or script pubkey.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Bitcoin address or hex encoded script pubkey

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: confirmations
parameters.description: Only return transactions with at least a certain amount of confirmations

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order in which the results are sorted (by height at which transaction was included in a block)

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Return only transactions included on or after a specific height

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Return only transactions included on or before a specific height

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

get.description: Retrieves all UTXOs associated with a Bitcoin address or script pubkey. Ideal for wallet views, dust filtering, or balance calculations. Can be tailored to exclude certain categories of UTXOs such as those used in metaprotocols.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Bitcoin address or hex encoded script pubkey

parameters.name: filter_dust
parameters.description: Ignore UTxOs containing less than 100000 sats

parameters.name: filter_dust_threshold
parameters.description: Ignore UTxOs containing less than specified satoshis

parameters.name: exclude_metaprotocols
parameters.description: Exclude UTxOs involved in metaprotocols (currently only runes and inscriptions will be discovered, more metaprotocols may be supported in future)

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order in which the results are sorted (by height at which UTxO was produced)

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Return only UTxOs created on or after a specific height

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Return only UTxOs created on or before a specific height

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

get.description: Retrieves a list of tickers of all deployed BRC20 assets.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

get.description: Information about a BRC20 token’s metadata and current state, including its symbol, deployment details, minting rules, total holders, and minted supply.

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: BRC20 ticker string

get.description: Retrieves a list of script pubkeys or addresses that hold the specified BRC20 asset and corresponding total balances.

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: BRC20 ticker string

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

get.description: List of all inscriptions in the collection represented by the queried symbol.

parameters.name: collection_symbol
parameters.description: Collection symbol (UTF-8)

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

get.description: Provides metadata for a given inscription collection symbol, including its name, image, supply, and external links. This is useful for rendering collection summaries or for display in marketplaces and aggregators.

parameters.name: collection_symbol
parameters.description: Collection symbol (UTF-8)

data.description: A collection of 1/1 art inscribed forever on the Bitcoin Blockchain. All 1/1s are inscribed on special sats.
data.name: 1/1 ART BY TWICK

get.description: Provides stats for a given inscription: total volume (in sats), floor price (in sats), and total listed. This is useful for rendering collection summaries or for display in marketplaces and aggregators.

parameters.name: collection_symbol
parameters.description: Collection symbol (UTF-8)

get.description:
Delivers information about a specific inscription, including its type, current location (UTXO and address), associated collection, and metadata like size and content preview (if text-based). Supports resolution of any inscription for wallet or explorer views.
A preview of the content body is given only if its type is `"text/plain"`. For the whole content, use the complementary endpoint, namely `/assets/inscriptions/{inscription_id}/content_body`.

parameters.name: inscription_id
parameters.description: Inscription ID

get.description: Lists all transactions that have involved the given inscription, starting from its origin (reveal transaction) and including all transfers.

parameters.name: inscription_id
parameters.description: Inscription ID

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of transactions per page

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order in which the results are sorted (by block height and tx index in the block)

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

get.description: Returns metadata of a collection for a given inscription ID, including its name, image, supply and external links.

parameters.name: inscription_id
parameters.description: Inscription ID

data.description: Ordinal #99999 has 50 alien friends. Would you like to join his Action Alien Club?
data.name: 99999 Action Alien Club

get.description: Retrieves the content body byte array of an inscription. This endpoint is complementary to the `/assets/inscriptions/{inscription_id}` (Inscription Information) endpoint.

parameters.name: inscription_id
parameters.description: Inscription ID

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of bytes per page

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string: the offset in the content body, in the form of an integer. Use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

get.description: Metadata specific to inscription.

parameters.name: inscription_id
parameters.description: Inscription ID

collection.description: Ordinal #99999 has 50 alien friends. Would you like to join his Action Alien Club?
collection.name: 99999 Action Alien Club

get.description: Lists all Rune tokens deployed, including names and IDs.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

get.description: Returns full details for a specific Rune token, such as its etching (origin) transaction, supply, number of holders.

parameters.name: rune
parameters.description: Rune, specified either by the Rune ID (etching block number and transaction index) or name (spaced or un-spaced)

get.description: Returns all transactions where the Rune was used or transferred, beginning with the etching (origin) transaction. Useful for auditing or building live token feeds.

parameters.name: rune
parameters.description: Rune, specified either by the Rune ID (etching block number and transaction index) or name (spaced or un-spaced)

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of transactions per page

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order in which the results are sorted (by block height and tx index in the block)

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Return only transactions created on or after a specific height

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Return only transactions created on or before a specific height

get.description: Lists all addresses currently holding a given Rune, with corresponding balances. Helps visualize token distribution and adoption.

parameters.name: rune
parameters.description: Rune, specified either by the Rune ID (etching block number and transaction index) or name (spaced or un-spaced)

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

get.description: Returns all UTXOs containing the specified Rune. Useful for raw state tracking and detailed token flow visualization.

parameters.name: rune
parameters.description: Rune, specified either by the Rune ID (etching block number and transaction index) or name (spaced or un-spaced)

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order in which the results are sorted (by height at which UTxO was produced)

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Return only UTxOs created on or after a specific height

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Return only UTxOs created on or before a specific height

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

get.description: Fetches full details of a block using its hash. Returns information such as height, timestamp, transaction count, miner, and size. Can be used to explore block metadata or confirm inclusion of transactions.

parameters.name: height_or_hash
parameters.description: Block height or block hash

parameters.name: from_timestamp
parameters.description: Whether numeric path param should be taken as timestamp instead of block height. Default: false.

get.description: List of all inscription activity in the block, ordered by transaction index in the block and by output index in the transaction.

parameters.name: height_or_hash
parameters.description: Block height or block hash

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of transactions (with inscription activity) per page

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

get.description: Returns a list of all transaction hashes included in the specified block. Supports pagination for blocks with a large number of transactions.

parameters.name: height_or_hash
parameters.description: Block height or block hash

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of transactions per page

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

get.description: Returns a full breakdown of a Bitcoin transaction by its hash. Includes inputs, outputs, fees, block confirmation details, and protocol-specific data (e.g., Ordinals, Runes, BRC20). This is useful for explorers, audit tools, or any application requiring full visibility into how funds and inscriptions are moved.

parameters.name: tx_hash
parameters.description: Transaction hash

get.description: List of all inscription activity in the transaction, including their satoshi-level positioning within transactions, ordered by transaction output index. The list of inscriptions is truncated to a maximum of 10,000 inscriptions.

parameters.name: tx_hash
parameters.description: Transaction hash

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of inscriptions per page

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

get.description: Returns an enhanced view of the transaction, including info about metaprotocols in both inputs and outputs. Useful for deep inspection tools.

parameters.name: tx_hash
parameters.description: Transaction hash

get.description: Provides detailed information for a single transaction output, including its value, spend status, and any attached metadata such as Ordinal inscriptions, Runes, or BRC20 data.

parameters.name: tx_hash
parameters.description: Transaction hash

parameters.name: output_index
parameters.description: Transaction output index

height.description: Height of block containing the satoshi activity.

tx_hash.description: Hash of transaction containing the satoshi activity.

runes.description: Existence of runes controlled by the address.

sat_balance.description: Current satoshi balance controlled by the address.

total_inputs.description: Total number of inputs (spent outputs) controlled by the address.

total_inscriptions.description: Total number of inscriptions currently controlled by the address.

total_outputs.description: Total number of spent or unspent outputs controlled by the address.

total_sat_in_inputs.description: Total number of sats in inputs controlled by the address.

total_sat_in_outputs.description: Total number of sats in spent or unspent outputs controlled by the address.

total_txs.description: Total number of transactions where the address controlled at least an input or an output.

total_utxos.description: Total number of unspent outputs (UTxOs) controlled by the address.

coinbase_tag.description: Base64-encoding of script pubkey used in coinbase transaction input.

metaprotocols.description: Whether any of the transactions in the block involved metaprotocols.

timestamp.description: The timestamp of the block, as claimed by the miner, in UTC format.

total_fees.description: Total fees paid by all transactions in the block, in satoshis.

total_volume.description: Total number of satoshis that went through this block, minus fees.

unix_timestamp.description: The timestamp of the block, as claimed by the miner.

weight_units.description: Number of weight units (WU) of the block.

BlockSatsPerVb.description:
For transactions within a block, these are the lowest, median and highest
satoshis per virtual-byte values.

max.description: Highest sat/vB value of the transactions within the block

median.description: Median sat/vB value of the transactions within the block

min.description: Lowest sat/vB value of the transactions within the block

block_height.description: The height of the block in the blockchain

content_body_page.description: Base64-encoded representation of a slice of the inscription content body. All types supported.

remaining_bytes.description: Number of bytes remaining in the inscription content body.

total_length.description: Number of bytes in entire inscription content body.

address.description: Address-encoding of the script pubkey at which the input containing the inscription resides.

input_index.description: Index of the input containing the inscription.

sat_offset.description: Offset of the inscribed satoshi within the input.

script_pubkey.description: Script pubkey at which the input containing the inscription resides.

sat_balance.description: Satoshi balance of the address at the end of this block.

timestamp.description: The timestamp of the block, as claimed by the miner, in UTC format.

unix_timestamp.description: The timestamp of the block, as claimed by the miner, in UNIX format.

usd_balance.description: USD balance if sat balance was exchanged. The exchange rate is that between USD and BTC at the time the block was mined.

received.description: List of inscriptions which the script gained control over.

self_transferred.description: List of inscriptions that were self-transferred in the transaction.

sent.description: List of inscriptions which the script lost control of.

height.description: Height of block containing the inscription activity.

tx_hash.description: Hash of transaction containing the inscription activity.

inscription_id.description: String representation of the inscription ID, whose first coordinate is the reveal transaction hash, and the second coordinate is the index of inscription in the reveal transaction.

tx_hash.description: Transaction in which the activity occurred

inscription_id.description: String representation of the inscription ID, whose first coordinate is the reveal transaction hash, and the second coordinate is the index of inscription in the reveal transaction.

String representation of the inscription ID, whose first coordinate is the reveal
transaction hash, and the second coordinate is the index of inscription in the reveal
transaction.

satoshis.description: Total number of satoshis in the UTxO containing the inscription.

utxo_block_height.description: Block height of the UTxO containing the inscription.

utxo_confirmations.description: Number of confirmations of the block where the UTxO containing the inscription was created.

utxo_sat_offset.description: Inscribed sat offset in the UTxO containing it.

utxo_txid.description: Transaction ID of the UTxO containing the inscription.

utxo_vout.description: Output index of the UTxO containing the inscription.

collection_symbol.description: Symbol of collection that the inscription belongs to.

content_body_preview.description:
Preview of inscription content body raw data. Max: 100 bytes.
Supported types: "text/plain", "text/plain;charset=utf-8", "application/json".

content_length.description: Length of entire inscription content body bytes array.

created_at.description: Block height of the reveal transaction.

inscription_id.description:
String representation of the inscription ID, whose first coordinate is the reveal
transaction hash, and the second coordinate is the index of inscription in the reveal
transaction.

address.description: Address-encoding of the script pubkey currenty controlling the inscription.

script_pubkey.description: Script pubkey currently controlling the inscription.

utxo_sat_offset.description: Inscribed sat offset in the UTxO containing the inscription.

utxo_txid.description: Transaction ID of the UTxO containing the inscription.

utxo_vout.description: Output index of the UTxO containing the inscription.

height.description: Height of the block which included the transaction

trade_index.description: Trade tx index in the block.

trades.description: List of trades in the tx.

estimated_blocks.description: Information about any estimated blocks from the mempool that were indexed in addition to the mainchain

mempool_timestamp.description: Timestamp of the indexed mempool snapshot, if any estimated blocks from the mempool have been indexed

decreased_balances.description: List of runes and amounts, corresponding to decreased balances for this address.

increased_balances.description: List of runes and amounts, corresponding to increased balances for this address.

self_transfers.description: List of runes that were self-transferred.

height.description: Height of block containing the rune activity.

tx_hash.description: Hash of transaction containing the rune activity.

divisibility.description: If no divisibility was specified, then this equals 0

amount.description: Amount of satoshis involved in the activity.

address.description: Address-encoding of the script pubkey at which the output containing the inscription resides.

output_txid.description: Hash of tx producing the output containing the inscription. If this is the hash of the coinbase tx of the block, then the inscription was spent as fee in a tx in the block and therefore sent to the output of the coinbase tx controlled by the block miner.

output_vout.description: Index of the output containing the inscription.

sat_offset.description: Offset of the inscribed satoshi within the output.

script_pubkey.description: Script pubkey at which the output containing the inscription resides.

price.description: Price for the runes exchanged in this trade, in sats.

sell_tx.description: Whether this trade was taken from a "sell" or a "buy" tx.

traded_amount.description: Amount of runes exchanged in this trade.

traded_rune_id.description: Traded rune ID, in (etching block, etching tx) format.

inscription_id.description: String representation of the inscription ID, whose first coordinate is the reveal transaction hash, and the second coordinate is the index of inscription in the reveal transaction.

satoshis.description: Number of sats locked in the UTxO.

token_amount.description: Number of tokens locked in the UTxO.

utxo_block_height.description: Block height of the UTxO containing the inscription.

utxo_confirmations.description: Number of confirmations of the block where the UTxO containing the inscription was created.

utxo_sat_offset.description: Offset of inscribed sat in the UTxO containing it.

utxo_txid.description: Transaction ID of the UTxO containing the inscription.

utxo_vout.description: Output index of the UTxO containing the inscription.

inputs.description: Summary of the inputs of the transaction. Maximum 10 returned inputs.

metaprotocols.description: List of supported metaprotocols involved in one or more transactions within the block.

outputs.description: Summary of the outputs of the transaction. Maximum 10 returned outputs.

sats_per_vb.description: sats per vB of the transaction.

total_inputs.description: Total number of inputs. No inputs means this is the coinbase transaction.

volume.description: Total number of satoshis that went through this transaction, minus fees.

height.description: Height of block containing transaction that the inscription took part in.

tx_index.description: Index of transaction (in block) that the inscription took part in.

burned.description: Number of runes burned in this transaction.

etching_tx.description: Whether this is the etching transaction of the rune.

height.description: Height of block containing the rune activity.

minted.description: Number of runes minted in this transaction.

receivers.description: List of addresses that see their rune balances increase after the tx, and the corresponding amount.

self_transfers.description: List of addresses and the corresponding amount, of addresses whose rune balances do not change after the tx, as they are only involved in self-transfers.

senders.description: List of addresses that see their rune balances decrease after the tx, and the corresponding amount.

tx_hash.description: Hash of transaction containing the rune activity.

address.description: Address-encoding of the script pubkey at which the input resides.

satoshis.description: Total number of satoshis in the UTxO.

script_pubkey.description: Script pubkey at which the input resides.

address.description: Address-encoding of the script pubkey at which the input resides.

inscriptions.description: Number of inscriptions in the UTxO.

runes.description: Number of rune kinds in the UTxO.

satoshis.description: Total number of satoshis in the UTxO.

script_pubkey.description: Script pubkey at which the input resides.

address.description: Address-encoding of the script pubkey at which the input resides.

inscriptions.description: List of inscription IDs and their offsets in this input.

runes.description: List of rune IDs and their amount in this input.

satoshis.description: Total number of satoshis in the UTxO.

script_pubkey.description: Script pubkey at which the input resides.

confirmations.description: Number of confirmations of the block.

inputs.description: List of inputs, in the same order as the transaction.

metaprotocols.description: List of supported metaprotocols involved in the transaction. Runes: etching, mint or edicts. Inscriptions: create or transfer. BRC-20 tokens: deploy, mint, transfer init or transfer.

outputs.description: List of outputs, in the same order as the transaction.

sats_per_vb.description: sats per vB of the transaction.

timestamp.description: The timestamp of the block, as claimed by the miner, in UTC format.

unix_timestamp.description: The timestamp of the block, as claimed by the miner.

volume.description: Total number of satoshis that went through this transaction, minus fees.

confirmations.description: Number of confirmations of the block.

inputs.description: List of inputs, in the same order as the transaction.

metaprotocols.description: Whether any of the transactions in the block involved metaprotocols.

outputs.description: List of outputs, in the same order as the transaction.

sats_per_vb.description: sats per vB of the transaction.

timestamp.description: The timestamp of the block, as claimed by the miner, in UTC format.

unix_timestamp.description: The timestamp of the block, as claimed by the miner.

volume.description: Total number of satoshis that went through this transaction, minus fees.

address.description: Address-encoding of the script pubkey at which the output containing the inscription resides.

satoshis.description: Total number of satoshis in the UTxO.

script_pubkey.description: Script pubkey at which the output containing the inscription resides.

spending_tx.description: If this output is known to have been spent, hash of the transaction that spent it.
